LanguageData.AEXP_EggCrocodileUnfertilized.label: crocodile egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggCrocodileUnfertilized.descriptio: An unfertilized crocodile egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggCrocodileFertilized.label: crocodile egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggCrocodileFertilized.description: A fertilized crocodile egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a crocodile. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggPlatypusFertilized.label: platypus egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggPlatypusFertilized.description: A fertilized platypus egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby platypus. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggDesertTortoiseUnfertilized.label: desert tortoise egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggDesertTortoiseUnfertilized.descr: An unfertilized desert tortoise egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggDesertTortoiseFertilized.label: desert tortoise egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggDesertTortoiseFertilized.descrip: A fertilized desert tortoise egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby desert tortoise. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggGilaMonsterUnfertilized.label: gila monster egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggGilaMonsterUnfertilized.descript: An unfertilized desert gila monster egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

LanguageData.AEXP_EggPenguinFertilized.description: A fertilized penguin egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby penguin. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
